description: Superlight, breathable and packable, this insulated jacket is a highly versatile technical midlayer. Intelligent body mapped synthetic insulation and breathable fabric maintains comfort during high output activities.
name: Rab Xenair Light Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Lightweight, breathable 20D Pertex® Quantum Air ripstop fabric with acrylic coating (47gsm)100% Polyamide
40gsm PrimaLoft® Gold Active+ insulation (55% recycled content) throughout, 100% recycled Polyamide
